::Lord Elder::
   
  Elder got Remus over the commlink.
   
  Elder: Lord Elder here. Kup and myself are with Rodimus and Nightlight on the island. Rodimus is still uncouncious. Meet us there.

khamkain <khamkain@...> wrote:
          As Remus witness the newly formed creatures with a strange calm on the
outside. In is mind, all kind of toughts were roaming. As Cyclonus was
turning back, Remus wanted to show Cyclonus he will be waiting for him . 
Remus : " OuR... nEXT... meeting .... wILl bE ... oUr... LAST.. FOr...
tHAT... I.. aM SUrE..."
He turned around without letting Cyclonus time to said anything to
return to the battlefield were Rodimus was defeated.

As he opened a commlink to any allies " LORD.. ELdeR... JoTUNN..
anY...ONe.. I.. HAve..ImPoRtANt... NeWS..aND.. Not MuCh... TIMe... lefT."

--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Super Cyclonus <supercyclonus@...> wrote:
>
> OOC: I hope this comes out right! Sorry it took so long, a good bit to
> make sure of. Oh well ...
> 
> BIC:
> 
> Cyclonus continued to bath the forms in energy as they shifted and were
> transformed by the now corrupted matrix! Then as soon as quickly energy
> started it stopped and the five forms lay before him. 
> 
> Two by two, five pair of optics fluttered and then lit as life once
> again invigorated their once apparently dead circuits. They sat up and
> nimbly climbed to their feet. 
> 
> "Greetings soldiers of Unicron!" Cyclonus' voice was rich and powerful
> as he regarded his progeny. "You have awakened to a new world, a new
> universe. I am Cyclonus, herald of Unicron, Introduce yourselves!"
> 
> The first to step forward was massive with weapons fairly ripping from
> his body. His most prominent features being the crimson cylinders of
> arm cannons that extended from massive red armored shoulders down past
> his elbows. While there are touches of red at his fore arms, hips and
> feet, the rest of his large form is dominated by gunmetal gray, with
> only highlights of yellow at his chest and face. "I am DEEPSTRYKE" he
> says, the deep bass of his voice reverberating across the area.
> "Superior firepower wins battles, superior intellect wins wars."
> 
> The next to step forward was a female, tall and slender, she radiated a
> cold power and confidence. She like Deepstryke was predominantly red,
> especially across her torso, chest, hips and feet, but most of the rest
> of her was covered in an ebony black armor. Her face is framed by four
> fin-like projections sweeping back behind her head like some mask, and
> yet the look of her face is almost achingly beautiful to behold. "I am
> PHOBIA." She smiled as she took her place behind the first. "Your
> greatest fear is my greatest vice."
> 
> The third to step forward is a truly dark soldier, colored in deep
> purple and black, his optics are almost furtive as he surveys the area.
> The twin boosters positioned above his shoulders, the nosecone on his
> chest as well as the wings that sprout from behind his shoulders and
> calves hint at his aerial alt-mode. He moved to stand to the other side
> of Deepstryke. "I am NIGHTRAZOR." His voice was quiet, understated and
> calm as his optics focused on Cyclonus. "Don't fear what you cannot
> see, fear what do not expect."
> 
> The next to step forward is another female robot, perhaps as tall as
> Phobia but not quite as smooth. She is wide shouldered and slim of hip,
> her armor is nearly all gunmetal gray, save for the items that betray
> her alt-mode. Large intake engines on her back, her face and a nosecone
> like assembly on her chest all display her aerial mode. At the top of
> her intake jet though open to display rather large speaker-like
> assemblies and the sound of her voice seemed to boom as much from them
> as from her mouth. "I am DECIBEL." Her voice is powerful as it echoes
> over the landscape. She quirked a small smile as her voice while
> assuming a more reasonable volume was still powerful nonetheless, "The
> sound of my music is death in your ears!"
> 
> The last of the quintuplets to step forward was something like
> Deepstryke. While not as tall, he was thick and well armored. The large
> intake jets that made up his chest were a deep blue as well as the
> cranial guard of is helm, parts of his fore arms, his hips, his lower
> legs and his feet. On his shoulder a large silver/gray cannon is
> mounted and in his left hand is an equally vicious looking rifle. His
> steps are heavy and powerful as he took up his place behind the rest.
> "I am TUMULT!" His voice was that of a soldier, zealous and eager, 
> "The greater the fight, the more glorious the Victory!"
> 
> As the five complete their introductions they unison drop to one knee,
> "We are yours to command Lord Cyclonus."
> 
> Cyclonus, who had been smiling up to this time frowned, "You are
> warriors of UNICRON! Never forget that." 
> 
> "Whatever you command Lord Cyclonus." They spoke once again in unison. 
> 
> 
> Cyclonus continued to frown, unsure if his point was taken.
> 
> Cyclonus turned to look at Remus, "Through the defeat of your leader
> you have been granted a stay of execution, that stay is at an end -
> follow us no longer." Cyclonus glanced skywards, obviously about to
> take off. He looked back at Remus, "But know this, without Rodimus
> Prime you cannot stand against us. If your leaders choose to surrender
> we may consider it. Otherwise when next we meet it will be as bringers
> of your destruction." 
> 
> Cyclonus smiled slightly, "Until we meet again maximal."
> 
> OOC: If Remus remains silent than all will move skyward and quickly
> disappear. 
> 
> Preston
> (Da'minion)
> 
> 
> 
>

>
